website_summaries.verdict: Set of 24 plastic cupping cups with pump gun and magnetic balancing needles.
pros: Added therapy utilizing magnetic "needles" provide balancing to traditional acupuncture points
Cups made with light, break- resistant plastic.Good variety of cup sizes
Comes with a user manual and application instructions
cons: Some buyers felt that the cups did not maintain suction
Hard plastic portions connecting the pump gun to the cups broke easily

customer_reviews.title: Very Desappointed !!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered Dec 9th. Used the extention hose twice since then and one of the “connector” of the hose cracked. At this point I can’t return it. Very Desappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: SPariera

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews that talked about the extension hose being the weak link. The plastic connector that goes over the cup cracked the second time I used it. You have to buy another pump to get the extension hose, which is probably where they make their money. You can't even return this POS, so don't bother wasting you money. Buy the cupping set that has an angled connector on the extension hose instead.
customer_reviews.author: mtodde

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used these cups maybe 5 times. The plastic "sleeve" that slides over the cup, is brittle and broke with my last use. Now the cups are not holding the vacuum anymore. I've duct taped the little piece in the hope that I can still use it somewhat, but it doesn't look professional at all. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C Binnie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Good suction, super fast shipping. Seems to be good quality and I am really enjoying this set. I was going to get a set like this but it was a 12 piece, glad I got this on. 24 pieces for a cheaper price! The pump works great, if I'm having issues with it I just pull on the little yellow thing then it starts pumping fine again, nothing to do with the actual pump. I just removed the magnets as I don't have any use for them. I am defiantly going to have to get a case for these. Great addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: WhisperSynn

customer_reviews.title: All you need for Cupping
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Well made. It comes with extra parts should you need them. It also has acupuncture point inserts which are not in the sales description. This is a vacuum set, so no heat or danger of burns. I would have given the set five stars, but the instruction book is next to worthless for english readers. The translations are so bad as to be humorous. So buy the set and study elsewhere how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: John Kusala

customer_reviews.title: works in theory, but poorly designed pump
customer_reviews.text: The positive is that the cups work well for temporary relief of localized muscle spasms in the back, when you can get adequate suction. The big negative is that the coupling between the pump and the suction cups is very poorly designed! The hose easily slips off of the cup valve, and so does the pump when you try apply the cup without using the hose. So it's hit and miss trying to get the cups to stick to the target area. When you can't get adequate suction, you won't get the therapeutic effect. This could be a much better product if the manufacturer could solve the issue of getting the pump solidly attached to the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cups - Bad attachment!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cups however, the plastic sleeve that fits the cups, cracked in 3 places within 5 minutes... they won't hold any suction. I wrote the manufacturer but I doubt they will do anything.. It's strange, they sent a few spare parts for everything else but not this vital piece.... oh well... :-( I will seek to find something that may work instead...
customer_reviews.author: Sundari1053

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Received these in 2 days. I love the ease of using them, easy on your hands. I thought they were in a case, (my mistake) so I will probably just keep them in the box in the styrofoam packaging to keep the cups safe and portable, They seem fragile. Used them on myself and was impressed with how strong the suction is. Be sure to check in with client to make sure they can handle it. Noticed a week later that some of the smaller cups were missing parts. Emailed seller, no answer back. They were cheap enough I do not want to go through the hassle of returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Cost effective.
customer_reviews.text: These cups are the real deal! Worth the price! The cupping session alone costs more than it does for you to purchase your own! Easy to use. Simple to clean. Simple to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett T.

customer_reviews.title: Cracking and breaking off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 5-6 sets of this, the last purchase the cups seemed more fragile. I’m Having lots of cups breaking and cracking from the pressure of the suction, even with only 2-4 full pumps. Cracks are coming from release valve and many are cracking around the rim lip, with the lip falling off completely. Sad waste of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: SCJL

customer_reviews.title: Used everyday in a high-volume clinic! Still in great condition.
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapy tech, and the physical therapists use almost this exact same set in the clinic. The picture on the front is different, but that is the only difference I have seen. Everything looks great, and I am excited to use the curved cups that are included in the package. In response to the many questions from other reviewers: we normally store our cups in the Styrofoam case it comes in, clean with Whizzer concentrated cleaner (lysol wipes should work too), and we use them for gliding all the time. Use plenty of lotion, and don't heat the plastic cups! We usually pop the magnets off.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Scott

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I had cupping professionally done, and loved it. She used the glass/fire method. Cupping is like having a deep tissue massage in 5 minutes. Eventually, it became too pricey to do regularly, so I looked into doing it on my own. These cups are perfect. I did remove the magnetic things inside of the cups. The set contains a great assortment of sizes of cups, and even includes a few curved ones which are great to have. I brought these to my massage therapist, and she thought they were great. I used avocado oil with these and it’s great for my sensitive skin. Got that off of amazon too!
customer_reviews.author: Hillmc719

customer_reviews.title: Bulging Disc & Spondylethesis
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has been suffering from pain of a bulging disc and spondylethesis. She was released to play sports and played softball and currently basketball through the nagging pain. She has slowly been making progress. We went to the doctor and he performed cupping and suggested more than just once a week. He suggested this product and when she started feeling relief, we decided to purchase this. Her pain has been less since starting the cupping regime.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not the same as image
customer_reviews.text: These came recommended by a fellow PT and after trying them in a course. The packaging of the cups that arrived was different and they did not hold suction like the cups I had tried. These were also very difficult to do any stripping with due to the poor seal. Recommend finding a better quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey L Lalime

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The set is fine, the quality is OK. The gun seems to be weak but works. For this money I do not regret this purchase. UPDATE after 7 month of regular use (every week or so): nothing is broken, everything works. One of the best things that I bought for our health.
customer_reviews.author: DreaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful and not all cups work
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful and a couple of the cups don't suction. I wanted to return it but there are no returns on item. I guess I assumed I could return it since it's an Amazon prime product, but I guess I should have read the fine print. My PT uses another brand (purchased from amazon) and I love the results I get with his cups.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Pump Broke After Third Use
customer_reviews.text: The pump broke after the third use...don't waste your money. Ive purchased other cupping sets that have lasted for 2-4+years. This didn't even last after the 3rd time...
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Just drop the hammer and buy it. You'll be glad
customer_reviews.text: This is addicting how good it feels. I did my research, which means I looked up cupping on youtube, and figured for how inexpensive it was, "why not?" I love it and it does seem to have a positive affect. My wife, a skeptic, allowed me to cup her back, in some of her problem areas, and sure enough, a week to two weeks later, she asked me to cup her back again. She now is a big fan of cupping as it relieves her chronic back pain. I do it because it's a dress reliever. For whatever reason, it works.
customer_reviews.author: LeoJoeL

customer_reviews.title: You may look like the victim of giant octopus attack but you will feel good!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since Micheal Phelps appeared at the Rio Olympics with red sucker marks on him, there has been more interest in cupping as a therapy. This is a nice and affordable set of cups with enough sizes for all your needs. The tube makes it easy for you to place cups on your own back or hard to reach places. Your tight or aching muscles will really feel a sense of relief afterwards. Don't worry too much about the science of cupping. Just put them on the areas that feel tight and leave them on for 5-10 minutes. It relieves the fascia of your muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Chan Yuen-Li

customer_reviews.title: so go with best value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Quality cups, they are decently hardy. The pump connector is very flimsy, it cracked on the first use. Still works, just have to connect gently and not push too hard. All the kits seems the same, so go with best value for your money. I like how many cups this kit has, and the box is sturdy with a great Styrofoam insert to keep the cups nestled neatly and quietly. Would buy again regardless of the cracked pump connector (all the pumps look exactly the same)
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These cups are AMAZING! I suffer from chronic trapezius muscle strain and these cups have done wonders to help my back. My boyfriend does the cupping for me on my back but I can easily do my neck with the hose adapter. Very easy to use, make sure to use an oil on your skin to make it easier for the cups to suction onto your skin — I use coconut oil. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN MODIFY THEM
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN BEST PRODUCT IVE PURCHASED IN THE PAST YEAR. I lived with a couple of girls that were in their last year of school for athletic training ( so they were trained on how to use these... which isn't really that hard) BUT I 100% reccomend buying these before you go and pay $80 plus to get this done at a "certified" place.... you'll save so much money and your can cup yourself or have a friend do it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: This is my first cupping set and works great. I recently took a cupping class for massage ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cupping set and works great. I recently took a cupping class for massage and this was the exact brand the instructor used but it was the set of 6. I am so glad I decided to go through Amazon to purchase this set. Great set for starting out. Brand new and exactly as described. Received it in 1 day with my Amazon Prime membership. Saved so much money going through Amazon. My instructor tried to charge the students $45 for the set of 6 from Kangshu. Enough cups for me to keep a set at home and a set at the spa. Just wished I ordered and extra pump. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE McCLOUD

customer_reviews.title: Broke in <30 days
customer_reviews.text: The product works, but after only a few uses the plastic connector between the cups & the vacuum pump broke rendering the product essentially useless. No spares included & no spares available for purchase... no contact information in the package to contact the seller directly. Disappointed that the quality was so poor. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: I used these all the time
customer_reviews.text: Love em! I like how this set comes with multiple sizes and even some ridged cups to get purchase on upper traps and even Achilles. I wish the magnetic pieces had some instructions tho. I’ve had difficulty finding clarity on how to use them. I assume they coordinate with meridians and points but that’s not explained.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth and Chris’ baby shower registery

customer_reviews.title: A truly great product.
customer_reviews.text: I was told of this product by a family member which she works in a chiropractic office and has learned to use these techniques. The order came on the day they said and in a very nice sturdy box with extra replacement parts for some of the items, the instruction booklet, and everything is so easy to understand and get use to. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby C.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Although it seems like voodoo, cupping actually works. I prefer cupping then doing some light workout moves. It has helped with my scar tissue like nothing I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Vick 10001110101

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several brands of these cupping kit and I have to say that I use this set the most. Love the large sizes and covers big areas. Pump is very efficient and although the set looks inexpensive, it works extremely well! Bought two sets and very happy with it and cupping. I only wished I discovered cupping decades ago!
customer_reviews.author: Ninja888

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful that these work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a alternative therapy doctor at my pain management clinic of my VA hospital to use on my back. I've only attended 1 out of 4 appointments scheduled so far. A friend of mine swears by the treatment. I am hopeful that these cups will help to heal my chronic bursitis over both his and my lower and upper back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Joy

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: I use these for self-care at home on myself and my family. they work pretty well too. my acupuncturist uses glass ones and I was concerned the plastic wouldn't work as well but am overall satisfied. being plastic it also makes me not nervous about letting my kids use them to cup my back. I took off the red and blue stick things in the center of the cups though, I like them much better that way
customer_reviews.author: LMT/mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: The best you can get for the least amount of money
customer_reviews.text: I first came across these cups at a few physios/chinese doctors in my area. The fact these were used by professionals says it all and after buying my own set, I know why. They do the job with no bling bling. If you know how to use them, they will do the job as will if not better than much more expensive sets. You won't be able to blame the equipment when using these.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Helps me greatly with pain relief, anxiety, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This works so well! I cup myself (Hardcore but carefully) every week or so, and they haven’t broken yet. This is a pretty legitimate and well known brand, and their customer service is awesome. I’ve definitley told a few friends about this particular item/seller. It came in a neat box, that’s held up pretty well. Just remember to wipe the cups down here and there with alcohol or something.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t crack your Hose connector!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, anyone who cracks thier connector on the hose, there is another green tip in the box it goes on the other end of the hose, the plastic doesn’t go onto the cup! I almost cracked mine after seeing people put it on the cup when I saw the “spare” green rubber tip. I think of you have already cracked yours the green tip could still make it work well. Pump could be a little better but over all. Recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jovanovich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very good product
customer_reviews.text: These cups are very easy to use. Very good product for its price. I used these for lower back pain and for blood stagnation and some other health issues. I usually do cupping on the 17th, 19th or 21st days of lunar month as it’s believed these are the best days for cupping therapy. I find it relaxing and I think it did help a bit with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hope

customer_reviews.title: I like the different sizes for different parts of the body
customer_reviews.text: It does help relieve body aches and pains. I like the different sizes for different parts of the body. It is well designed that you can do cupping on yourself and especially be able to reach your back without anybody's help. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MPV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing instant relief
customer_reviews.text: I still have some learning to do as far as placement and vacuum strength, but the amount of immediate relief is so worth it. I would definitely buy again. I would also suggest getting g the 24 cup set over the 12 cup set because when you start getting good at this thing, you will end up needing more cups than what's in the 12.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SERVICE, QUICK DELIVERY, EFFECTIVE CUPPING EQUIPMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to add cupping to my CEU Course for Massage Therapists and I needed an effective starter set for my therapists to train with. I am impressed! These are easier than the moxie cups, and while the moxie cups have different benefits, the glass and the flame was not the most favorable for most therapists and many of my therapists travel. These are sturdy, and work great! The pump will certainly help develop forearm muscles, too! =) This company was FAST delivery and I will be ordering more merchandise from them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: pump is not workin
customer_reviews.text: The pump worked only for a couple of minutes. I was able to stick only two cups. Pump suction stopped working on the third. Don't waste your time and money. Company is not accepting returns.
customer_reviews.author: Ensar Demirkan

customer_reviews.title: I have been certified in cupping
customer_reviews.text: The cups which were the same brand that I was trained on do not seem to have the same suction. I still cant reach my back , but thats on me. Relieves some pain but must keep them on a lot longer to make them half as effective. Wish they were stronger in the seals so suction worked better.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: doesn't hold suction for long
customer_reviews.text: These cups go on easy, but no matter how many pumps you use, they lose suction after 45-60 seconds. The bigger cups held on longer, but the smaller ones just didn't want to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: love that I can remove the magnets
customer_reviews.text: these are so easy my youngest child uses them on himself...I took out all the magnets, which I love that they are removable.
customer_reviews.author: Léah Landry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, easy to use, great quality. I have had for over a year and my item is still in great condition! Highly highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jp queen of the house

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and WAAAAY better than the ones we used in school. The cups are strong and sturdy, so they stay where you place them and actually get suction. There are a couple smaller cups that have a curved rim, which is nice for the spots where flat cups won't lay flat like forearms.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Welter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really give me surprise that new two diffe rent shape cupping . Great i can easy cupping my wrist and my knees. I thought i uses this brand about at least 10 years , i started to use them from my mum bought them then i bought them too. very good quality and can use long time. thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Has a book with explanation. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. Easy to use,very complete and the book teach enough to use it right. Thanks .Keep doing good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: F C

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good accept the magnets.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic not too thin, durable. Pump works great. Smooth edges so they don’t dig in or scratch. The magnets are not strong enough for therapeutic benefit, but that’s not unusual for most of these sets.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMT

customer_reviews.title: BEST product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I use it for my whole family. Works for running cupping which I love. Helps with colds, flu, and aches and pain. I use this for my neck pain very often and it always helps right away. I even purchased one for my mother-in-law
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am using these at home because spa treatment gets costly. I was skeptical that they wouldn't work as well as the ones the pros use, but I was wrong! These work great!! Many sizes to choose from and the quality is very good. My son already had me work on his back and was happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: bill bates

customer_reviews.title: Received the set and was pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Received the set and was pleased with it. Read the instructions and the ease of use for these were simple. Had my wife puts some of the cups on my back where I have a knot and the muscle is tight. Felt the entire muscle in my back as the cup was on. So I had my wife put cups along the rest of the muscle. left them on for 3-4 minutes. I can say that the main spot of the muscle feels better. We will continue using these and hopefully my muscle will loosen and heal.
customer_reviews.author: jared pyatt

customer_reviews.title: Cups crack after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: After slide cupping a few times, there are cracks in the tops of my cups. I am not using a lot of suction since it is 'slide' cupping so I don't believe that is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Annie L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Covered in dead bugs!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box it was filled with dead bugs. Unable to return and waiting on response from seller. Very angry and grossed out! *Not being given the option to load pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain and circulation but hard to do without help
customer_reviews.text: Very strong suction and it comes with plenty of cups to do an entire back and then some! The only problem I had was with the tube that allows you to do treatments yourself--mine just wouldn't work. Otherwise, with help from someone I'm able to get my back pain minimized.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Reif

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times, and it has helped alleviate pain. Can get a very strong suction with this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle mj

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cups!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get so many cups with different sizes. Good price point. First set I bought. I used the gun and plastic tubing for self care cupping on my neck and shoulders. Good suction. Felt pain relief within a few days. Two weeks into me using this set... there was no suction on a few of the medium sized cups. So I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: BeUtiful feet

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase. We ordered another one case
customer_reviews.text: Super happy. Great brand, great quality.fast shipment. The best thing is most are big size cups. Awesome ! Highly recommended this seller
customer_reviews.author: D. G

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work great
customer_reviews.text: I may be doing something wrong but couldn't get these to suction on a lot of areas of my body or others. Instructions are in Chinese so you will have to rely on YouTube was really excited about this purchase but if you can't get it to work what's the point. Have had for 6 weeks and will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cupping set for anyone looking to try cupping
customer_reviews.text: I’d use these more if my boyfriend actually let me use them on him! I use them on myself for headaches and plantar fasciitis - very effective. Good for self-massage!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cups dont work at all and also there is no return policy .. Stay away from this istem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leary at first but for $28
customer_reviews.text: Will never have on hand again. Relaxed my concrete muscles that 3 $100 massages couldn't. Got the blood flowing again. Use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Helped my sore back!
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time! If I wake up with a krink in my neck or back pain, I just put these on and it feels so much better. My boyfriend also uses them after a hard day of training. I also had some trouble with my knees hurting, and put these along my thighs, and much to my surprise, my knee pain dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rotramel

customer_reviews.title: All acupressure points
customer_reviews.text: First of all this is crazy that I cannot return product...you think with 24 cups at least 2 bigger cups wouldn’t be acupressure style cup bought this kit before and they were non acupressure cups but not this kit..didn’t even come sealed..buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: steven p.

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Previous sets were better. Got these based on recommendation from a co-worker, but her set came with more contoured cups, much better for use in smaller and curved areas. This set only has 2 small contoured cups. Very disappointed, but apparently I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good durable set!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with connectors breaking. This set has been really durable and it really does help with pain relief for the low back.
customer_reviews.author: Jabimus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product excellent suction and durable. Way better than the acu brand.
customer_reviews.author: AcquaEve

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY...no suction!
customer_reviews.text: Suction does not stay no matter how still u are. This is item is not returnable. Buy another brand this one is a waste. So mad I am stuck with it and still need to buy one that actually has a decent but I'm sure much better suction then this. So mad
customer_reviews.author: LuMa

customer_reviews.title: This one really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I have heard good things about cupping, and wanted to try it. This set has a lot in it and is easy to use. Excellent quality. Instructions are a little iffy, but tutorials for anything and everything are on the internet!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: The cupping kit is great for the first time user learning how to cup
customer_reviews.text: The cupping kit is great for the first time user learning how to cup. Also works well with castor oil moving cupping. The cups rinse well with baking soda and water, dawn, or alcohol. Highly recommend for at home novices and new accupuncture students.
customer_reviews.author: maria vickie lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set, has gotten a good amount of use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, has gotten a good amount of use and held up well. I am still learning things to do with it, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value. I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a good product
customer_reviews.text: so far I really like this product. It has helped several of my clients rather quickly . And I used it on myself, which is awesome to relieve should tension and congestion. pretty cool. Im learning about the magnets and I'm glad they are removable. I wasn't confident using them at first.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Eisenberg Jachim

customer_reviews.title: Add one more glowing review
customer_reviews.text: Yes another glowing review. I have had MANY sets like these over the years and this one is a great buy for the price. High quality, a great variety of sizes and a very good pump. I bought one for a friend and was so pleased with her, I bought one for myself to replace my old one ( which was double the price ).
customer_reviews.author: True Love Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works very well sometimes I have to readjust sonit pumps but other than that it works good
customer_reviews.author: Adonis v.y

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but may have a life span
customer_reviews.text: Most of the times, it works as expected. I subtract one star because sometimes, the seal is a little finicky. I use the tube extension all the time because I normally self-administer the cupping, and the part that connects the tube to the cups appears to get looser over time. We'll see if it eventually loses the seal completely.
customer_reviews.author: mudworm

customer_reviews.title: Cupping
customer_reviews.text: These are just as described. Very durable. I use them daily in my massage therapy practice.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Inman

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these a couple of times 1 broke the first day I tried them. The suction is not very good. Could not find instructions in English. I finally gave up and went into my account to return them and unfortunately the window to return them closed 3 days ago, I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jill Krause

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... I use it almost every week I use it on my arthritis knees and also in my back for tension relief my legs also enjoy this product
customer_reviews.author: Zayra

customer_reviews.title: I also have a firecupping set. This set is ...
customer_reviews.text: I also have a firecupping set. This set is a little easier to use. Just make sure you apply lotion to the skin first.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My fellow Massage Therapist said she bought this set a long time ago and LOVES her set! I'd have to agree! I love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great cups!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups! Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: cup, cup, hurray!
customer_reviews.text: Great cupping tools. The gun helps you apply more and more suction as you require it. It came with a bag to put the cups into when you are not using them...I however, will keep them in the box they came in. I was able to use them in the bathtub and timed the suction to 5 minutes each application...The gun is hard plastic as are the cups, so I don't want to drop them ( Might crack or shatter)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I wish the instructions were better explained. It's kind of hard to follow them when you don't know what you are doing. Other than that the quality of the products are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana L. Ataniya

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Another great item that's so much cheaper than from the doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these on some of my patients and every time it yielded good results. The instructions that come with it aren't great, so I recommend educating yourself on what you're looking for regarding color changes before using the product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chesten Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Good for sciatica!
customer_reviews.text: Never cupped before. This is amazing. Magnets, suction, handheld, easy to use. Navigated the Chinese website thanks to google and found the sciatica diagram. Within 2 days (2 cupping sessions) my wife's leg wasn't pins-and-needles and she could actually walk around. It pulls blood and relieves pressure in the area and over all lowers blood pressure since its like leaving hickeys all over your body. Don't know if it will work for your ailment, but it works for my wifes sciatica and I am ordering a backup in case something happens to this set.
customer_reviews.author: CastleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Low suction power
customer_reviews.text: Could use more suction power other then that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Hip pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these cups post hip surgery and have seen a big improvement on my mobility and pain. They have been awesome at relieving pain associated with tight hip flexor and quad muscles. Easy to use on myself. Plenty of cups in various sizes. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael D Beal

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and exactly what I expected. Directions are in Chinese but I was able to learn to use them online so I had no problems. I would definitely recommend to anyone interested in cupping..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Duran

customer_reviews.title: Back Pain Relief!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cupping set. My wife has a lot of chronic back pain and this has made a big difference. We typically use it at night before bed, but sometimes use it before church. It can really help her feel good while having to sit for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Warren

customer_reviews.title: No refund
customer_reviews.text: I received this promptly. Tried to use one time and the valves do not work to hold the air in after one use. Tried to refund and was told no refund options. Absolutely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nicely boxed and had good suction but have not seriously ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely boxed and had good suction but have not seriously used it yet. Might try it on my girlfriends nips and vag first.
customer_reviews.author: Km89

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for myself, my brother and my dad. My brother and I feel amazing and my dad's knee pain is gone! I also like the sturdy material it's made of, everything was completely intact upon arrival and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Best cupping set for my sessions!
customer_reviews.text: I was so use to the silicone cups they didn’t have a good enough suction. They would fall off some of my clients that didn’t have a lot of body fat. Now with this set it’s amazing! I love it and my clients love it! I’m a happy LMT!
customer_reviews.author: Crysta Haase

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but not easy to use,and after few times used it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: yes

customer_reviews.title: Healed my pain
customer_reviews.text: I loved the small set so much that I ordered this one. AMAZING for deep knots. My knots are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the professional or at home enthusiast. These cups hit the full spectrum of size for any need or application.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The instructions are a little weird. Its in chinese with English. However the english is worded weird but pictures help.
customer_reviews.author: jess c.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made and dose not hold suction.
customer_reviews.text: The actual pump is cheap plastic. Unfortunately it would not hold suction either.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblepatch

customer_reviews.title: Cupping gun cracked
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing until the cupping gun cracked. I used it personally and with my patients and was very happy until the plastic on the gun cracked and now it will not work. I am currently looking for other cupping sets. Love cupping it works great, just need to be able to get the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Great cupping
customer_reviews.text: Great cupping set, way better than my previous one! The curved cup is awesome for difficult spots
customer_reviews.author: jkruem

customer_reviews.title: This therapy really works!
customer_reviews.text: This therapy really works! my chiropractor recommended trying an at home kit.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Krouse

feature_bullets: 24 different size cups with 20 biomagnetic points
Easy to use pressure release valves
Iso9001 quality and fda registered manufacturer
